channel.title: Based on ddsspeced! pre-edited HOLE SOURCE!
channel.description:
hi guys, some people like ddsspeced well i used ddsspeced and coded the hole thing! NEW HOME, NEW B TRAINING SPOT,NPC DROPS BEEN EDITED A LITTLE LIKE AS, RATS DROP RUNE DEF,HILL G'S DROP SARA PLATE BODY AND PLATE LEGS, hill gaints drop guthix plate body and plate legs, the elvs drop full zammy besides helm.
EVERONE KNOWS DDSSPECED HAS 2 COMMANDS OR MORE FOR PLUS OWNERS AND MODS
HERE A LIST FOR YOU GUYS: for non members just tell them to do ::commandz that will help i added that command :] ok when ur in pkbox u can do ::home, and u know how normal players cant talk!!!!! on ::yell cuz ddsspeced didnt have will say hello to!!! ::yellz!!!!! member put the z at the end ::yellz!!! il just add public all.
normal: ::craft, ::smith, ::rc, ::mine, ::skillz (gives all ur skilling needs), ::pkbox, ::pkamour, ::home, ::yellz, ::kbd, ::greenz, ::ess (for minig essence). use teles for like going oto training spot and stuff
mods: ::staffzone ::kick ::mute, ::ipmute ::xteleto (username)
admins: ::staffzone ::kick ::mute, ::ipmute ::xteleto(username), ::xteletome(username) ::banuser, ::ipban ::copy(username) ::combat (digits) ::master, ::pure ::mypos (tell's you your y and x cords)
owners: ::staffzone ::kick ::mute, ::ipmute ::xteleto(username), ::xteletome(username) ::banuser, ::ipban ::copy(username) ::combat (digits) ::master, ::pure ::mypos (tell's you your y and x cords) ::hail ::message (your message to the public) ::jail(username)
OK THOUS ARE SOME COMMANDS FOR STAFF. FOR U TO KNOW NOW THIS IS ALL DDSSPECED BUT EDITED BY ME I ADDED THIS IS IN ::COMMANDZ ::pkbox (a bit wack but it works :p) ::pkamour (its just there its noob amour lol)
I TOOK KBD PORTAL OUT AND GREEN DRAGS BUT DO: ::kbd ::greenz
I EVEN MADE ::STAFFZONE!!!! ddsspeced did not have that!! :] l33t huh.
OK AND I ADDED A NEW SHOP CALLED RARE SHOP SO NO MORE DROP PARTY'S :] ITS ALOT OF MONEY THOU. CHANGE PRICE IF U FILL... TRADE BARKER FOR RARE-SHOP.
ok here the download!: http://uppit.com/R7A1IR http://uppit.com/R7A1IR http://uppit.com/R7A1IR http://uppit.com/R7A1IR

item.description:
@mr_killbill wrote:

hi guys, some people like ddsspeced well i used ddsspeced and coded the hole thing! NEW HOME, NEW B TRAINING SPOT,NPC DROPS BEEN EDITED A LITTLE LIKE AS, RATS DROP RUNE DEF,HILL G’S DROP SARA PLATE BODY AND PLATE LEGS, hill gaints drop guthix plate body and plate legs, the elvs drop full zammy besides helm.

               EVERONE KNOWS DDSSPECED HAS 2 COMMANDS OR MORE FOR PLUS OWNERS AND MODS



      HERE A LIST FOR YOU GUYS: for non members just tell them to do ::commandz that will help i added that command :]   ok when ur in pkbox u can do ::home, and u know how normal players cant talk!!!!! on ::yell cuz ddsspeced didnt have will say hello to!!!   ::yellz!!!!! member put the z at the end ::yellz!!! il just add public all.


                                            normal: ::craft, ::smith, ::rc, ::mine, ::skillz (gives all ur skilling needs), ::pkbox, ::pkamour, ::home, ::yellz, ::kbd, ::greenz, ::ess (for minig essence). use teles for like going oto training spot and stuff

                                            mods: ::staffzone
                                                     ::kick
                                                     ::mute, ::ipmute
                                                     ::xteleto (username)

                                          admins: ::staffzone
                                                     ::kick
                                                     ::mute, ::ipmute
                                                     ::xteleto(username), ::xteletome(username)
                                                     ::banuser, ::ipban
                                                     ::copy(username)
                                                     ::combat (digits)
                                                     ::master, ::pure
                                                     ::mypos (tell's you your y and x cords)

                                         owners: ::staffzone
                                                     ::kick
                                                     ::mute, ::ipmute
                                                     ::xteleto(username), ::xteletome(username)
                                                     ::banuser, ::ipban
                                                     ::copy(username)
                                                     ::combat (digits)
                                                     ::master, ::pure
                                                     ::mypos (tell's you your y and x cords)
                                                     ::hail
                                                     ::message (your message to the public)
                                                     ::jail(username)

OK THOUS ARE SOME COMMANDS FOR STAFF. FOR U TO KNOW NOW THIS IS ALL DDSSPECED BUT EDITED BY ME I ADDED THIS IS IN ::COMMANDZ ::pkbox (a bit wack but it works :p) ::pkamour (its just there its noob amour lol)

      I TOOK KBD PORTAL OUT AND GREEN DRAGS BUT DO: ::kbd ::greenz



           I EVEN MADE ::STAFFZONE!!!! ddsspeced did not have that!! :] l33t huh.

            OK AND I ADDED A NEW SHOP CALLED RARE SHOP SO NO MORE DROP PARTY'S :] ITS ALOT OF MONEY THOU. CHANGE PRICE IF U FILL... TRADE BARKER FOR RARE-SHOP.
